name: El camino de S4M
description:
Welcome to El Camino de S4M (S4M´s journey)! 

S4M, an android made by humans, travels from planet to planet with his rocket to recover fragments of human history that have been lost due to a misteroius monster attack. Accompany S4M on this adventure to save humanity.

This game is not fully completed. This was a project made for a university assignment at UPV, Valencia, so the game is in Spanish. Unity and Blender were used to make this videogame. The only level available is the first planet, however you can still travel to level two, but you can not explore it fully.

Our group names and our contact are:
